metadata.title: CVE-2012-2738 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The VteTerminal in gnome-terminal (vte) before 0.32.2 allows remoteauthenticated users to cause a denial of service (long loop and CPUconsumption) via an escape sequence with a large repeat count value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2738` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvte-common - 1:0.28.2-5ubuntu1
libvte9 - 1:0.28.2-5ubuntu1
python-vte - 1:0.28.2-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vte package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.28.2-5ubuntu1').
